Optional new parent category's UUID. Used for category reassignment. Null for making category root. Must not violate hierarchy constraints.

parent_id.description: Optional new parent category's UUID. Used for category reassignment. Null for making category root. Must not violate hierarchy constraints.

name.description: New category name. Must be unique among siblings. Optional for selective update.

depth.description: New category depth value. Used if changing position in hierarchy. Optional.

IAimallBackendCategory.ICreate,[object O.description: Schema for updating an existing product category. Permits modification of name, parent_id, and depth fields supporting hierarchy changes and renaming.

Page number (optional for pagination).
Limit of records per page. Defaults as needed.
Limit of records per page. Defaults as needed.

IPageIAimallBackendChannelAssignment,[ob.description: Search/filter and pagination request DTO for querying channel assignment records.

provider.description: Identity provider code. Must be atomic and match internal registry (e.g., 'google', 'kakao').

external_user_id.description: External provider user ID to link.

IAIMallBackendExternalAccount,[object Ob.description: DTO for creating a new external account linkage. Only includes fields accepted at creation (no PK, no FK, no audit).

IAimallBackendAuditLog.IRequest,[object.description:
analytics(분석) 시스템의 감사 로그(Audit Log) 단일 엔터티 레코드. 이 타입은 플랫폼 내 모든 주요 관리자/시스템/자동화 이벤트, 데이터 변화, 설정 변경, 접근 기록 등을 위한 정규화된 감사 이력을 제공합니다. 모든 데이터는 Prisma schema의 aimall_backend_audit_logs 를 완전히 반영하며, 데이터는 변경 불가(append-only, no update) 정책에 사용됩니다.

- event_type: 이벤트 종류 ('LOGIN', 'PERMISSION_CHANGE', 'DASHBOARD_UPDATE' 등).
- actor_id: 이벤트를 수행한 담당 관리자(actors domain).
- event_target: 대상 엔티티 식별자(대시보드/설정키/외부자원 등).
- ip_address: 접속 IP (nullable).
- outcome: 'SUCCESS', 'FAILED', 'DENIED' 등 결과.
- detail_json: 상세 context(Json직렬) (nullable).
- created_at: 타임스탬프(UTC 및 ISO 8601, 생성시점 결과값 DB 입력됨).

보안/컴플라이언스적 신뢰성과 이력감사, 표준 감사/로그분석 기능 구현의 핵심 타입입니다. 모든 하위/상위 시스템의 Audit/AOP, Dashboard, Admin 등에서 공통 사용합니다.

id.description: 감사 로그의 UUID 기본키. 레코드 1:1 고유 식별자.

oneOf.description: 이벤트를 실행/주도한 관리자(actors/administrators)의 아이디. 시스템 프로세스/익명/백엔드인 경우 null 허용.
이벤트를 실행/주도한 관리자(actors/administrators)의 아이디. 시스템 프로세스/익명/백엔드인 경우 null 허용.

actor_id.description: 이벤트를 실행/주도한 관리자(actors/administrators)의 아이디. 시스템 프로세스/익명/백엔드인 경우 null 허용.

event_type.description: 이벤트 종류(동작 구분) - 예: 'LOGIN', 'PERMISSION_CHANGE', 'DASHBOARD_UPDATE', etc. 주요 Audit 구분자. 쉼표 없이 대문자/언더스코어 조합.

oneOf.description: 감사 이벤트의 대상 리소스/식별자. 예: dashboard code, config key, resource id 등. 없을 경우 null.
감사 이벤트의 대상 리소스/식별자. 예: dashboard code, config key, resource id 등. 없을 경우 null.

event_target.description: 감사 이벤트의 대상 리소스/식별자. 예: dashboard code, config key, resource id 등. 없을 경우 null.

oneOf.description: 이벤트 발생 당시 IP 주소. 서버/시스템훅/자동화에서는 null.
이벤트 발생 당시 IP 주소. 서버/시스템훅/자동화에서는 null.

ip_address.description: 이벤트 발생 당시 IP 주소. 서버/시스템훅/자동화에서는 null.

outcome.description: 결과 상태('SUCCESS', 'FAILED', 'DENIED' 등). 각 이벤트 outcome의 업무측 의미가 반드시 audit 규정에 명시되어야 함.

oneOf.description: 이벤트 상세 context/증빙/추가 메타데이터(직렬화된 json string, nullable, 없음=필드생략). 예: {"previous_role":"user","new_role":"admin"}, 첨부 등.
이벤트 상세 context/증빙/추가 메타데이터(직렬화된 json string, nullable, 없음=필드생략). 예: {"previous_role":"user","new_role":"admin"}, 첨부 등.

detail_json.description: 이벤트 상세 context/증빙/추가 메타데이터(직렬화된 json string, nullable, 없음=필드생략). 예: {"previous_role":"user","new_role":"admin"}, 첨부 등.

created_at.description: 감사 로그 이벤트가 기록된 시각(UTC, ISO 8601 완전체 지정), 시스템 입력

id.description: Primary Key. Unique per product option. Typed as UUID string.

product_id.description: Foreign Key reference to aimall_backend_products.id. Indicates which product this option belongs to.

name.description: Atomic name of the product option (e.g., 'Color', 'Size'). Must be unique per product+name+value tuple.

value.description: The atomic value for this product option (e.g., 'Red', 'Medium').

IAimallBackendProductOption.IRequest,[ob.description: Represents a single product option variant as defined in aimall_backend_product_options (e.g., 'Color: Red'). Each record is unique per (product_id, name, value). Used for variant selection and catalog management.

IAimallBackendReview.IUpdate,[object Obj.description: 커뮤니티 댓글 페이징(요약) 결과. 각 댓글 데이터는 요약형(IaimallBackendComment.ISummary)으로 구성됨. 페이지 정보 포함.

The requested page number (1-based). Null for first page/default.

page.description: The requested page number (1-based). Null for first page/default.

Search filter for enabled/disabled channels. Null for both.

enabled.description: Search filter for enabled/disabled channels. Null for both.

Sort field for records. Allowed: 'name', 'code', 'created_at', 'updated_at'. Null for default sorting.

IPageIAimallBackendChannel,[object Objec.description: Request object for advanced searching/pagination/filtering on aimall_backend_channels. Aligns with DTO search patterns described in the business specifications.

name.description: Optional filter for RBAC permission code/name (exact or partial match). For search interfaces and filtering in the admin panel.

display_name.description: Optional filter for permission display name. Allows searching for permissions by visible name across different locales or panels.

created_at_from.description: Lower bound (inclusive) for creation date. ISO8601 date-time for time-range filtering.

created_at_to.description: Upper bound (inclusive) for creation date. ISO8601 date-time for time-range filtering.

page.description: Results page number (1-based). Used in pagination with standard IPage style types.

limit.description: Maximum records per page. Max usually 100 for admin UIs.

IAimallBackendPermission.ISummary,[objec.description: Advanced search and filter DTO for querying permissions/roles in the RBAC system. Used by PATCH endpoints for paginated, filtered, and sorted retrieval.

oneOf.description: Optional updated shipping carrier name. This is a string value and updates the delivery/fulfillment provider for the shipment.
Optional updated shipping carrier name. This is a string value and updates the delivery/fulfillment provider for the shipment.

carrier.description: Optional updated shipping carrier name. This is a string value and updates the delivery/fulfillment provider for the shipment.

oneOf.description: Optional. New or corrected carrier tracking number. Can be null if tracking is still unavailable. Used to maintain shipment traceability.
Optional. New or corrected carrier tracking number. Can be null if tracking is still unavailable. Used to maintain shipment traceability.

tracking_number.description: Optional. New or corrected carrier tracking number. Can be null if tracking is still unavailable. Used to maintain shipment traceability.

oneOf.description: Optional. Updated status of this shipment. Must match acceptable status values for the business process, e.g., 'pending', 'shipped', 'delivered'. Null means status unchanged. Changing status can trigger event notifications.

Optional. Updated status of this shipment. Must match acceptable status values for the business process, e.g., 'pending', 'shipped', 'delivered'. Null means status unchanged. Changing status can trigger event notifications.

shipment_status.description: Optional. Updated status of this shipment. Must match acceptable status values for the business process, e.g., 'pending', 'shipped', 'delivered'. Null means status unchanged. Changing status can trigger event notifications.

oneOf.description: Optional. The new or corrected timestamp for when the shipment was shipped. Null means not set or unmodified.
Optional. The new or corrected timestamp for when the shipment was shipped. Null means not set or unmodified.

shipped_at.description: Optional. The new or corrected timestamp for when the shipment was shipped. Null means not set or unmodified.

oneOf.description: Optional. Record or update the completion timestamp for delivery confirmation. Null if the delivery is incomplete or to be reset.
Optional. Record or update the completion timestamp for delivery confirmation. Null if the delivery is incomplete or to be reset.

delivered_at.description: Optional. Record or update the completion timestamp for delivery confirmation. Null if the delivery is incomplete or to be reset.

IAimallBackendShipment.ICreate,[object O.description: DTO for updating an existing shipment record. All properties are optional and represent atomic fields within the shipment record. Setting a value will replace the previous database value, while omitted properties remain unchanged.

IAimallBackendCart.IUpdate,[object Objec.description: Paginated result for cart item entities. Contains pagination metadata and a data array of cart item model records.

customer_id.description: UUID of the customer who is receiving the point/mileage transaction. Required for all creation events as foreign key constraint.

oneOf.description: Optional UUID for related order, if transaction is order-triggered (accrual/redemption via purchase/refund). Null for non-order-related events (e.g., sign-up bonus or manual entry).
Optional UUID for related order, if transaction is order-triggered (accrual/redemption via purchase/refund). Null for non-order-related events (e.g., sign-up bonus or manual entry).

order_id.description: Optional UUID for related order, if transaction is order-triggered (accrual/redemption via purchase/refund). Null for non-order-related events (e.g., sign-up bonus or manual entry).

oneOf.description: Optional UUID for related coupon, for events like coupon-based point accrual, or null for non-coupon activity.
Optional UUID for related coupon, for events like coupon-based point accrual, or null for non-coupon activity.

coupon_id.description: Optional UUID for related coupon, for events like coupon-based point accrual, or null for non-coupon activity.

amount.description: The signed value of points to accrue, redeem, or expire. Positive means award; negative means redemption/expiration. Backend must enforce underflow/overflow limits.

type.description: Type of transaction: one of 'accrual', 'redemption', 'expiration', 'refund_reversal'. Application/endpoint logic may validate.

oneOf.description: Human- or machine-readable note for the transaction: e.g., 'Bonus campaign', 'Order redemption', can be string or null.
Human- or machine-readable note for the transaction: e.g., 'Bonus campaign', 'Order redemption', can be string or null.

description.description: Human- or machine-readable note for the transaction: e.g., 'Bonus campaign', 'Order redemption', can be string or null.

oneOf.description: Optional: explicit expiration date/time for this transaction or null for non-expiring events.
Optional: explicit expiration date/time for this transaction or null for non-expiring events.

expired_at.description: Optional: explicit expiration date/time for this transaction or null for non-expiring events.

IAimallBackendLoyaltyTransaction,[object.description: Represents a request to create a new loyalty transaction event. Consumer must provide all atomic fields necessary for legal and compliance trace; required fields as per schema.

id.description: Primary key for order item record. System-assigned UUID.

product_id.description: Product UUID. References the master product catalog.

oneOf.description: The product option (SKU/variant) UUID, nullable if the product has no options.
The product option (SKU/variant) UUID, nullable if the product has no options.

product_option_id.description: The product option (SKU/variant) UUID, nullable if the product has no options.

item_name.description: The display name of the order item, as shown on receipts or in order history. This is a denormalized, point-in-time snapshot taken at order creation to support legal compliance and audits.

quantity.description: The number of units ordered for this item line. Must be positive.

unit_price.description: Snapshot of the per-unit price for this order item at purchase time.

total_price.description: The total price for this order item line. Typically, quantity multiplied by unit_price at time of order.

IAimallBackendOrderItem.IRequest,[object.description: Represents a single product (with optional variant) line within an order. Used for detailed reporting, fulfillment, and audit traceability. Fields are denormalized for legal compliance (price snapshots, display name, etc).

oneOf.description: FK to post being commented (if this is a post-comment).
FK to post being commented (if this is a post-comment).

post_id.description: FK to post being commented (if this is a post-comment).

oneOf.description: FK to review being commented (for review threads). May be null.
FK to review being commented (for review threads). May be null.

review_id.description: FK to review being commented (for review threads). May be null.

oneOf.description: Parent comment (if this is a reply to another comment).
Parent comment (if this is a reply to another comment).

parent_id.description: Parent comment (if this is a reply to another comment).

body.description: Main comment text. Cannot be empty.

is_private.description: Whether the comment is private. Enforces business privacy flag.

IAimallBackendComment,[object Object].description: DTO for creating a new comment (aimall_backend_comments). No primary key/id — this is generated on save. Ownership set by authenticated user context, not in payload.

id.description: Unique identifier of the configuration record. Relates to the primary key of aimall_backend_configurations in the database.

oneOf.description:
Optional foreign key to the channel the configuration is scoped to.

Null for global configurations. If present, matches an existing channel id.

Optional foreign key to the channel the configuration is scoped to.

Null for global configurations. If present, matches an existing channel id.

channel_id.description:
Optional foreign key to the channel the configuration is scoped to.

Null for global configurations. If present, matches an existing channel id.

oneOf.description:
Optional foreign key to the section the configuration is scoped to (within the channel).

Null if configuration is global or channel scoped only. If present, matches an existing section id.

Optional foreign key to the section the configuration is scoped to (within the channel).

Null if configuration is global or channel scoped only. If present, matches an existing section id.

section_id.description:
Optional foreign key to the section the configuration is scoped to (within the channel).

Null if configuration is global or channel scoped only. If present, matches an existing section id.

key.description:
Configuration key/name (unique within the combination of channel_id+section_id).

Examples: 'site_maintenance', 'enable_ai_feature', 'banner_image_url'.

Corresponds directly to the key column.

value.description: Actual configuration value as a string (flexible format: may be interpreted by type in frontend or via code).

oneOf.description: Optional admin/internal comment or documentation string for this configuration.
Optional admin/internal comment or documentation string for this configuration.

description.description: Optional admin/internal comment or documentation string for this configuration.

created_at.description:
Timestamp indicating when this configuration record was created.

ISO 8601 format, e.g., 2025-07-29T16:33:39Z.

updated_at.description:
Timestamp indicating last change to this record.

Always updated on mutation for proper audit tracking.

IPageIAimallBackendConfiguration.ISummar.description:
Represents a full configuration record from aimall_backend_configurations.

Links to channel/section as appropriate, contains key/value pairs for platform settings.

Includes audit timestamps and optional internal description.

Every returned field aligns with the table columns described in the Prisma schema.

id.description: Primary key UUID for the discount campaign. Referenced throughout coupon and analytics records for campaign scoping and audit trail.

name.description: Display name for the discount campaign visible to admin and reporting tools. Must be unique within UI and analytics context. This is a normalized, atomic field only. See campaign documentation in the discount and loyalty system requirements.

code.description: System-unique code for the campaign (e.g., 'BLACKFRIDAY2025'). Used for programmatic lookups, input validation, and campaign stacking logic. Uniqueness enforced by schema and required for advanced cross-referencing in coupon and fraud detection.

type.description: Type of discount logic (e.g., 'order', 'product'). Defines whether rules apply at the order or product line level for eligibility and campaign tracking. Must conform to business rules described in campaign entity docs.

status.description: Current status of the campaign ('active', 'inactive', 'ended', etc.). Used for operational control and campaign lifecycle transitions. See campaign state machine as defined in functional requirements.

stackable.description: True if this campaign can be combined (stacked) with others, subject to platform stacking rules. This is a core business logic field as described in campaign stacking requirements.

start_at.description: Timestamp at which the campaign becomes eligible for discounts or coupon issuance/application. Must be in ISO 8601 format. Business logic must enforce campaign eligibility windows.

end_at.description: Timestamp after which the campaign is no longer valid for discount/coupon application. ISO 8601 format; used for reporting and fraud analytics.

oneOf.description: Maximum number of times an individual user can redeem benefits under this campaign. A null or 0 means unlimited per requirements. Must comply with campaign-level and coupon issuance rules.
Maximum number of times an individual user can redeem benefits under this campaign. A null or 0 means unlimited per requirements. Must comply with campaign-level and coupon issuance rules.

max_uses_per_user.description: Maximum number of times an individual user can redeem benefits under this campaign. A null or 0 means unlimited per requirements. Must comply with campaign-level and coupon issuance rules.

priority.description: Campaign priority for stacking/precedence resolution. Higher INTEGERS override lower ones. Used in conflict detection and order of application analytics.

oneOf.description: Long-form business/admin description of what this campaign is used for. Intended for compliance, audit tracing, and staff review. Nullable.
Long-form business/admin description of what this campaign is used for. Intended for compliance, audit tracing, and staff review. Nullable.

description.description: Long-form business/admin description of what this campaign is used for. Intended for compliance, audit tracing, and staff review. Nullable.

IPageIAimallBackendDiscountCampaign,[obj.description:
A discount campaign entity for platform-wide or scoped discount rules, as modeled in the AIMall Prisma schema. Captures major campaign attributes, eligibility rules, stacking, assignment, audit, and business tracking.

Strictly normalized and used wherever a discount campaign is referenced in coupons, redemptions, and analytic workflows. All property documentation references schema comments and operational system requirements.

IAimallBackendSupportTicket.IUpdate,[obj.description: Paginated result type for FAQ entries. Includes FAQ data and pagination meta. Used for FAQ browsing and search in help center UIs, admin panels, and mobile clients.
